name: CELL (itch) (krainert, fochtler, cristi, MaboZuka)
description:
A game about introspection and boxes.

Move The Cube = W,A,S,D
Move Camera = Right-Click & mouse move
Zoom Camera = Scroll

The team:

  • Jan Flessel (sound design)
  • Gregory Garcia (programming)
  • Toke Krainert (level design, producing)
  • Magnus Myrälf (environment art)
  • Cristi Patrascu (programming)
